name: Mysterious Dungeon
description:
Mysterious Dungeon is a 2D top-down adventure like game where the player ventures into a dungeon that randomly generates on each entry. Within they will find monsters and chests strewn about the place. Collect the loot and use it to upgrade yourself to make your dungeon delving easier and increase your odds of survival.

Mysterious dungeon was created for a class-wide game jam with the theme of exploration and discovery.

Music from JP Soundworks (https://www.youtube.com/c/JPSoundworks/)

Feedback is appreciated. All I ask is that you do not be too harsh.
If you do play, thanks so much.
